channel.title: Removing chat couler apon speaking
channel.description:
hello there i was just wondering if anyone could help me figure out how to remove the chat couler that apears when i log on, e.g when i type something it apears white i wish it to be removed and to go back to its default couler
thanks for taking the time to read this.
